document.heading: Uniform Commercial Code Secured Transactions Revision Act of 2000

history.narrative: Law 13-201, the “Uniform Commercial Code Secured Transactions Revision Act of 2000,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-370, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 6, 2000, and July 11, 2000, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 11, 2000, it was assigned Act No. 13-434 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-201 became effective on October 26, 2000.
